documentation.text:
@dev user unvotes from a proposal, redeeming the voting power he previously committed to the proposal.
 Can be done on both an open and an already closed proposal
@dev the proposal creator closes the proposal, preventing new votes

@dev contract's owner updates the proposalCreationRequirement value, which is the minimum amount of voting power
 required to open a new proposal

documentation.text:
@dev user unvotes from a proposal, redeeming the voting power he previously committed to the proposal.
 Can be done on both an open and an already closed proposal
@dev the proposal creator closes the proposal, preventing new votes

@dev contract's owner updates the proposalCreationRequirement value, which is the minimum amount of voting power
 required to open a new proposal

closeProposal(uint256).details: the proposal creator closes the proposal, preventing new votes

constructor.details: Initializes the contract setting an initial proposalCreationRequirement and setting the deployer as the initial owner

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

redeemEther(uint256).details: user redeems all or some of the Ether he previously locked, granted that it's available and not used in ongoing proposals

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

unvoteFromProposal(uint256).details: user unvotes from a proposal, redeeming the voting power he previously committed to the proposal. Can be done on both an open and an already closed proposal

updateProposalCreationRequirement(uint25.details: contract's owner updates the proposalCreationRequirement value, which is the minimum amount of voting power required to open a new proposal

voteProposal(uint256,uint256,bool).details: user votes on a proposal by allocating some of his voting power
